page.title: 09BUS SERVICE & PETROL STATION
page.content: South Godstone has a{London Country {Bus Service}which runs from Croydon to East Grinstead every hour. There is also a Greenline Service every hour to and from East Grinstead and Hemel Hempstead. The buses are very important to the village particularly for the young and the old people. Children from Blindley Heath and Godstone use the buses to travel to and from school and the elderly, many of whom have no cars or cannot drive, travel by bus cheaply with a bus pass. One petrol station serves the village. It has a small shop attached selling motor accessories, and a large showroom selling mainly speedboats. At the rear of the garage is a large workshop for car repairs.
